vote.title: Authorize a twenty-year lease agreement with Ables Springs Solar, LLC, for approximately 4,496 square feet of land located in Kaufman County, to be used for the installation, maintenance and operation of a single, underground electrical circuit and associated fiber for the period November 1, 2024 through October 31, 2044 - Estimated Revenue: Dallas Water Utilities Fund $322,443.66
